name: ApexSqlDotDeploy
description: Execute schema and data synchronization scripts against target database.
author: ApexSQL LLC

inputs.name: specIsOutputIncluded
inputs.label: Include output in package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Store output in NuGet package file

inputs.name: specOutputName
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify output package file name. Use format {name}.{major}.{minor}.{build}

inputs.name: sourceUseScriptsFromPackage
inputs.label: From a package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if database synchronization scripts are stored in package

inputs.name: pkgStoredOn
inputs.label: Stored on
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose whether package is sourced locally or from online feed

inputs.name: sourcePackageName
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter full path, with file name and extension, to NuGet package with stored database source. Leave empty if package, created in previous task, will be used

inputs.name: sourceFeedPackageName
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of package located on designated online feed

inputs.name: sourceFeed
inputs.label: Feed URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL to online feed where package is located

inputs.name: sourceSchemaSyncFile
inputs.label: Schema Sync file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter full path, with file name and extension, to schema synchronization script

inputs.name: sourceDataSyncFile
inputs.label: Data Sync file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter full path, with file name and extension, to data synchronization script

inputs.name: targetSqlServer
inputs.label: Target SQL Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target database server. E.g. SERVERNAME\INSTANCENAME. For local default instance leave as '(local)'

inputs.name: targetSqlAuthLogin
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify login name to use for SQL Server authentication. Leave empty for Windows authentication

inputs.name: targetSqlAuthPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify password to use for SQL Server authentication. Leave empty for Windows authentication
